data.text:
@GabriellaBuba So hope you get better.

I now keep ginger beer/tea on hand as either my oldest or myself seems to be continously dealing with one bug or another these days.
@noreenlekhak I like it! but just cuz its what my lola always made when I was sick
@GabriellaBuba We have dried dates that we put on sweets etc but buying a whole packet might be too much but if tastes good then maybe it’s worth it..

@noreenlekhak Yup I strain it, keep the tea! (And sometimes eat the rehydrated dates lol) 

heads up these are dried red dates which are a different kind then golden dates/jujubes cuz I've caused that confusion before
@GabriellaBuba I’ve been drinking chai with honey and ginger but maybe I outta go to the store and get some dates. Do you seive it and keep the water?
@noreenlekhak I bet that would work! I just keep lots of dried galangal on hand so I use it in all my long boiled teas
@GabriellaBuba I have ginger root instead of galangal
